Articles.Content:
Sorry if this has been asked before.

How do I make it so Mechjeb shows up in an earlier position on the science list in Career Mode?

Thanks.

Most of the configuration of parts, including their career mode setup, is in a simple text format in the part.cfg file in the part directory...

See here

If you have installed mechjeb AFTER you unlocked the nodes where its parts are, then you need to go to your science tree, and click on the nodes and search for parts that arent yet unlocked in that node.

Then right click and a message will show if you wish to unlock that part (purchase that part if I remember correctly)
